attributes.action: Make a British Court of human rights.
attributes.background: When we leave the EU we wont have access to the Courts of human rights and the government can get away with stripping away benefits and also they will end up taking away the minimum wage. we will no longer have free health care and this country will continue to get poorer and poorer.

rejection.details:
The European Court of Human Rights is not an EU court, so we're not sure what action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You can find out more about the ECHR here:

http://www.echr.coe.int/Pages/home.aspx?p=court&c=
